summary:
## Rayon: A Semi-Synthetic Fiber

Rayon is a special type of fabric made from a natural substance called cellulose, found in plants like wood. It's created by dissolving cellulose and then reshaping it into fibers. These fibers can feel like silk, wool, or cotton. Rayon is versatile and can be woven or knitted into various textiles for clothing and other uses. The production process involves making cellulose dissolve so it can be molded into different shapes.
title: Rayon
